polls¶

Classes¶

QuickPoll

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

Functions¶

setup(bot)

class polls.QuickPoll(bot)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.Cog

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to help group commands together. More information on them can be found on the Cogs page.

When inheriting from this class, the options shown in CogMeta are equally valid here.

await tally(self, ctx, poll_id)¶

Get polls results

Parameters

poll_id (discord.ext.commands.MessageConverter) –

await quickpoll(self, ctx, *questions_and_choices)¶

Makes a poll quickly.

The first argument is the question and the rest are the choices.

Also can’t use the tally command here

Example: )quickpoll question option1 option2

Parameters

questions_and_choices (str) –
